attributes.action: Minimum and maximum sentences for drug-related offences to be reduced.
attributes.additional_details:
What I want the government to do is re-assess the sentencing for drug dealers and/or any drug related crimes as well as re-assessing the sentencing for rapids, child molesters, groomers etc. 
The whole purpose of this petition is to get drug sentencing lowered and sexual abuse sentencing raised.
attributes.background: Reduce the minimum and maximum sentence for drug dealers as it isn’t a realistic sentence especially when it is compared to the cases of rapists, child molesters, sexual groomers etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you'd like a review of drugs sentencing, or for sentences to be reduced.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. There's already a petition calling for increases to sexual offence sentences

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577443
